newsitem.title: FRANCE: HORSE RACING-GRAND PRIX DE SAINT-CLOUD RESULT.
newsitem.headline: HORSE RACING-GRAND PRIX DE SAINT-CLOUD RESULT.

text.p: Result of the Group One Grand
Prix de Saint-Cloud for three-year-olds and upwards, run over
one and a half miles (2.4 kms) at Saint-Cloud on Sunday:
Winner owned by Enrique Sarasola and trained in France by
Pari-Mutuel (includes a one-franc stake): Win 1.10, straight
